Events archive

Former events at MaiNLP

2023

  • December 19, 2023: On-site talk by Dr. Martijn Bartelds (University of Groningen)
  • November 20, 2023: On-site talk by Jan Philip Wahle (University of Göttingen) and Dr. Saif Mohammad (NRC Canada)
  • November 8, 2023: On-site talk by Dr. Paul Rötter (Bocconi University)
  • October 5-6, 2023: Interested in NLP and linguistic variation? Check out the Multi* workshop we organize at ITU Copenhagen
  • September 25, 2023: On-site talk by Janet Liu (Georgetown University)
  • July 14, 2023: On-site talk by Dr. Lea Frermann (University of Melbourne)
  • June 23, 2023: Prof. Barbara Plank participated in a hearing at the Bavarian parliament on ChatGPT in academia, Anhörung zur Künstlichen Intelligenz im Wissenschaftsbetrieb
  • June 5, 2023: On-site talk by Dr. Yves Scherrer (University of Helsinki)
  • May 15, 2023: On-site talk by Dr. Michael A. Hedderich (Cornell University)
  • May 8, 2023: On-site talk by Dr. Saif Mohammad (NRC Canada)
  • April 25, 2023: Barbara Plank's ERC and our MaiNLP lab research is featured in the LMU University news! "Language technologies for digital inclusion" (available also in German: "Sprachtechnologien für die digitale Teilhabe")
  • April 24, 2023: Barbara Plank, Katya Artemova and Verena Blaschke will present and be panel mentors at the Munich Women in NLP get-together
